CONNECTION_CODE.description: Asena session changed! Type your MJ-SIR code here.

SUDO.description: Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number.

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language. English => en, Malayalam => ml

BOT_PRESENCE.description: Type the Presence of bot, presences: online => Always Shows the online, offline => Always Shows offline, typing => Always Shows typing, recording => Always Shows recording.

AUTO_BİO.description: Set true for auto date, time in biography.

OWNER_NAME.description: reply for .owner ! give your details, Use => default, to change back.

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

DISABLE_BOT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Herokuda uygulama adı. Heroku APP Name.

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.

WORK_TYPE.description: WhatsAsena Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot.
